plot: Mr. Fox, a movie producer, is resusitated from a cryogenic freeze, only to find out that his future is not as he hoped it would be. He is just a head.
title: Welcome Back Mr. Fox
plot_es: Mr. Fox, a movie producer, is resusitated from a cryogenic freeze, only to find out that his future is not as he hoped it would be. He is just a head.
plot_en: Mr. Fox, a movie producer, is resusitated from a cryogenic freeze, only to find out that his future is not as he hoped it would be. He is just a head.
